content:
Hi ,

I am trying to check Subscriptions. Is http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu3/ enable subscriptions?

I am able to create Subscription object with channel rest-hook and criteria with Observation resource which have social-history as category and gave an endpoint.

But I didn't get any call from FHIR server once I added new Observation, I checked in Logs of end point given.

Cana you please guide us , am I doing any thing wrong?

Thankyou in Advance.
You may want to try the #hapi stream for that.
